channel.title: How can i change the background in a 677/7**
channel.description: how can i change the background in a 677/7** i got a sprite editor but i don't know the sprite id and how i can change it because the sprite id 4139 to 4146 are pieces of the whole sprite but when i do my pieces of the sprite in it it don't work and i get an error something with the quality or with how big the image is plz help me solving this problem
